body.name: Better Houseware 1484.8 Over Sink Dish Drainer, 19.25 x 8.25 x 4.5, Stainless Steel

Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 10 hrs 59 mins
features: Space Saving Design – This dishrack fits across the kitchen sink to save counter space
Ventilated Open-Wire Rack – With no need for a tray to catch the water as it drips directly into the sink, dishes and pans dry quickly in this stainless steel coated rack
Holds Full-Size Plates – The dish drying rack has a small footprint but it holds full-size dishes and pots
Non-Slip Handles – The handles are coated on this stainless steel dish draining rack, so they will not slip or scratch the sink or counter
Durable Rack for Drying Dishes – The Stainless Steel design is sturdy, long-lasting and prevents rusting of this dishes draining rack
body.description: Save space and keep the counter free in your kitchen at home or office or on a RV or boat. with the Better Houseware 1484. 8 Stainless Steel Over the Sink Dish Drainer Rack. Our air-drying rack for dishes and cookware is made of long-lasting stainless steel that will stand up to daily use without the worry of rust. Each rack is made to fit over a standard sized sink, allowing the water from the dishes to drain into the sink, and keeping the countertop dry. Our Over-Sink dishrack can hold up to 7 full-size plates, or pots and pans, as well as kitchen tools and gadgets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Space-Saving Space-saving Solution for use over sink or on counter. Perfect for small kitchens and keeps counter clean and clutter-free. Compact and Sturdy: holds full-size plates, pots and pans. Stainless Steel Space saving Over-Sink Dish Drainer crafted of Stainless Steel with Coated Non-Slip Handles and coating on bottom to protect dishes and counter. Dishwasher Safe Ventilated open-wire design is ideal for quick drying of dishes and dish rack. Easy to keep clean and mold-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like to wash some things by hand
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace the one that I've had for about fifteen years. I consider it to be one of my kitchen essentials. Even though I have a dishwasher, I like to wash some things by hand, especially pots and pans that take up too much space in the dishwasher. Also there are a few things that might not do well in the dishwasher. The one that I have had for so many years is a white, vinyl covered drainer. It has recently begun to show a little rust in a few small places....still useable but I wanted to replace it.I looked at all similar drainers that were available and read the reviews on them. This one was less expensive than the others that I was considering. It looked the most like the one that I'm used to and know works the way I like. I measured my sink and ordered the correct size. It fits perfectly, looks nice and I'm confident that it should last for a long time. I like the fact that the parts that aren't covered in the black vinyl (plastic or whatever) are stainless steel and I'm hoping that it doesn't rust. I also chose this one because it doesn't have the adjustable end pieces and feel that it is more sturdy because of this. This little sink dish drainer comes in handy for so many things!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Kitchen Space Saver Dish Drain
reviews.reviewText: There’s only two of us in our household and not always a reason to run the dishwasher (often weeks go buy without a need). I hate the clutter of a large dish rack draining on the counter. This is the perfect solution. We have a double sink and this only takes up half of one side, leaving plenty of space to still rinse whatever I want or still use the other sink (and disposal) in its entirety. This item is coated so should not rust easily but that said, eventually I would suppose it might possibly in some areas after a few years but for under $20 I don’t feel that’s a huge issue. Be sure to measure your sink as it is not adjustable. It would be even better if it had devoted space for flatware but it’s still a very good little space saver and handy item for any kitchen. I also use it to defrost items from the freezer so the drip directly into the sink rather than leave on the counter. I definitely recommend this item as long as the dimensions fit your sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: This fits my sink fine and does just what I need for the number of dishes I wash each day. My only criticism is that the black plastic on some of the metal tines wears off after about a year. But the price is low enough that I just bought a replacement and can hopefully use the worn one elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST dish drainer EVER!
reviews.reviewText: We have a big Blanco stainless steel sink in our kitchen, which goes very well with our very modern style. Because the sink has only one big opening, I would have to put a dish drainer on my kitchen countertop, which I absolutely despise. So in comes this sleek, narrow dish drainer that goes over our sink! It looks amazing, it functions perfectly, and stores more dishes than one would imagine. Best of all, it doesn't take up too much space, so I still have plenty of room to wash my dishes and large pots without bumping into it. I bought an extra one just in case they stop carrying them..the last one lasted us for over 5 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great counter space saver
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for - saves counter space, easy to move, just enough space for a handful of dishes, very sturdy, no rusting so far. The rubberized bottom and handles are great for preventing it from slipping and scratching against our countertops. We have a dishwasher, so we use this dish rack to dry out hand washed dishes. It’s quite small so I would not recommend this to someone hand washing all of their dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dish Rack!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item mainly to hold my sponges and dish rag. I have two sponges, one that I labeled to clean the cat's feeding/water dishes and another one to clean the sink. Also, with this sink, I can't put the dish rag over the center because water tends to drip on it so this is a perfect solution. It keeps everything out of the sink and off of the counters. It fits perfectly and is very sturdy. I don't really use it for dishes. The inside measurement of my sink is 16.25 inches. I also love how it looks in the kitchen. It is very stylish and should last a long time. (I purchased my hand soap and hand lotion dispensers from Amazon as well. They are the Godinger Dublin lotion dispensers.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking for a long time
reviews.reviewText: Looked for a long time I am happy with my purchase I did have an old dish drain with a removable silverware part / container (really don't know what to call it) took it off the old and use it for the new!!!!It's very nice I'll am done I just hang out on the wall.Nice size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and efficient
reviews.reviewText: We wanted to save on counter space and this little drainer was a good size to sit in our sink. We have a large sink, not a double sink. but this gives room to walk and dry. the annoying but is our plates dont fit in the slats and there is no where to dry the silverware so they just fall through the cracks. i do like the rubber on the drain portion so it will limit rusting. i think if i add a little holder for silverware then its more useful. will keep because its the perfect wee size. its narrow, but unless you just hosted 10 people this drainer does fine for a household of two.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great fit for a strange sink
reviews.reviewText: My partner and I bought this as a temporary solution for our very strangely-sized double sink, but I've mentioned to him many times that I'm actually very happy with it. It is very sturdy and is holding up very well. I really like that one side is slotted for plates, and the other is flat for glasses/whatever else. It is a huge difference when it comes to safely stacking clean dishes to dry (we don't have a dishwasher, so that is LOTS of dishes, pots, pans, and cups a day...) My only criticism would be that it doesn't come with a cutlery compartment, but I understand that not everyone wants that. We ended up just getting a plastic container at the dollar store, and we can remove it if we're not washing cutlery and need more space in the actual rack. But otherwise, we're very happy with our purchase! :)

Me gusto mucho, ya que lo pongo adentro de donde lavo los trastes , y si son ollas grandes o muchos platos a lavar lo saco y lo pongo a un lado. Es cierto que no tiene escurridor de cubiertos, pero eso se resuelve poniendo una cubetita a un lado o fuera del escurreplatos.Saludos!

reviews.reviewTitle: good quality, exactly the right size
reviews.reviewText: good quality, exactly the right size, just what i needed to free up bench space

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product, good value, good durability
reviews.reviewText: This product is all around good. key things for those that don't read the product info. It's NOT adjustable, it's really not that wide so if you're looking for something big that you can throw a whole bunch of stuff on at any given time this is not it. It'll hold a few things at a time for some quick dishes. Doesn't take up a lot of space. It feels sturdy and clean.Can definitely recommend the product. Would be perfect if it were SLIGHTLY wider to give more room.
Llegó en excelentes condiciones, es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, cumple con las características que mencionan y con mis expectativas. Muy recomendable 👌👌
